trait.name: Brave
text: The half-dragon has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Brute
text: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the half-dragon hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
text: The half-dragon makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Spear
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. and range 20/60 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Shield Bash
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
text: The half-dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Parry
text: The half-dragon adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the half-dragon must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
